Verses: 1 savulin Kudumbaththukkum Dhaaveedhin Kudumbaththukkum; Nedunaal Yuththam Nadandhadhu; Dhaaveedhu Varavara Balaththaan; Savulin Kudumbaththaaro Varavara Balaveenappattup Ponaargal.
2 ebronile Dhaaveedhukkup Pirandha Kumaarar: Yesrayel Ooraalaana Aginovaamidaththile Pirandha Amnon Avanukku Mudhal Pirandhavan.

3 naabaalin Manaiviyaayirundha Karmel Ooraalaana Abigaayilidaththile Pirandha Keeleyaap Avanudaiya Irandaam Kumaaran; Moondraam Kumaaran Kesoorin Raajaavaana Thalmaai Kumaaraththiyaagiya Maakkaal Petra Apsalom Enbavan.
4 naalaam Kumaaran Aageedh Petra Adhoniyaa Enbavan; Aindhaam Kumaaran Abiththaal Petra Seppaththiyaa Enbavan.
5 aaraam Kumaaran Dhaaveedhin Manaiviyaagiya Eklaalidaththil Pirandha Idhreyaam Enbavan; Ivargal Ebronile Dhaaveedhukkup Pirandhavargal.
6 savulin Kudumbaththukkum Dhaaveedhin Kudumbaththukkum Yuththam Nadandhuvarugirapodhu, Apner Savulin Kudumbaththile Balaththavanaanaan.

7 savulukku Aayaavin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Rispaal Ennum Perulla Oru Maru Manaiyaatti Irundhaal; Isposedh Apnerai Nokki: Nee En Thagappanaarudaiya Marumanaiyaattiyinidaththil Pravesiththadhu Enna Endraan.

8 apner Isposeththin Vaarththaigalukkaaga Migavum Koban Kondu: Ummai Dhaaveedhin Kaiyil Oppukkodaamal, Innaalmattum Ummudaiya Thagappanaagiya Savulin Kudumbaththukkum, Avarudaiya Sagodhararukkum, Snegidharukkum, Dhayavuseygiravanaagiya Ennai Neer Indru Oru Sthreeyinimiththam Kutrampidikkiradharku, Naan Yoodhaavukku Utkaiyaana Oru Naaiththalaiyaa?
9 naan Raajyabaaraththai Savulin Kudumbaththai Vittuth Thaandappanni, Dhaaveedhin Singaasanaththaith Thaan Thuvakkip Peyersebaamattumulla Isravelinmelum Yoodhaavinmelum Nilainiruththumpadikku,
10 karththar Dhaaveedhukku Aanaiyittapadiye, Naan Avanukku Seyyaamarponaal, Dhevan Apnerukku Adharku Sariyaagavum Adharku Adhigamaagavum Seyyakkadavar Endraan.
11 appozhudhu Avan Apnerukku Bayappattadhinaal, Appuram Oru Marumozhiyum Avanukku Sollaadhirundhaan.

12 apner Than Naamaththinaale Dhaaveedhinidaththirku Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi: Dhesam Yaarudaiyadhu? Ennodu Udanpadikkai Pannum; Idho, Isravelaiyellaam Ummidaththil Thiruppa En Kai Ummodirukkum Endru Solla Sonnaan.

13 adharku Dhaaveedhu: Nalladhu, Unnode Naan Udanpadikkaipannuven, Aanaalum Ore Kaariyam Unnidaththil Kettukkollugiren; Adhu Ennavenil, Nee En Mugaththaip Paarkka Varumpodhu, Savulin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Meegaalai Nee Azhaiththuvaravendum; Adharkumun Nee En Mugaththaip Paarppadhillai Endru Sollachcholli,

14 avan Savulin Kumaaranaagiya Isposeththinidaththirkum Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi: Naan Pelistharudaiya Nooru Nuniththolgalaip Parisamaagak Koduththu Vivaagampannina En Manaiviyaagiya Meegaalai Anuppividum Endru Solla Sonnaan.
15 appozhudhu, Isposedh Avalai Laayeesin Kumaaranaagiya Palththiyel Ennum Purushanidaththilirundhu Azhaiththu Vara Aatkalai Anuppinaan.
16 aval Purushan Pakoorimmattum Aval Piragaale Azhudhukonduvandhaan; Apner Avanai Nokki: Nee Thirumbippo Endraan; Avan Thirumbip Poivittaan.
17 apner Isravelin Moopparode Pesi: Dhaaveedhai Ungalmel Raajaavaaga Vaikkumpadikku Neengal Aneganaalaaith Thedineergale.

18 ippodhum Appadi Seyyungal; En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Kaiyinaal En Janamaagiya Isravelaip Pelistharin Kaikkum, Avargaludaiya Ellaa Saththurukkalin Kaikkum Neengalaakki Ratchippen Endru Karththar Dhaaveedhaikkuriththu Solliyirukkiraare Endraan.

19 indhappragaaramaaga Apner Benyameen Manushar Kaadhugal Ketkap Pesinaan; Pinbu Apner Isravelar Paarvaikkum, Benyameenudaiya Ellaak Kudumbaththaarin Paarvaikkum, Sammadhiyaanadhaiyellaam Ebronile Dhaaveedhin Kaadhugal Ketkap Pesugiradharkup Ponaan.
20 apnerum, Avanodekooda Irubadhuperum Ebronilirukkira Dhaaveedhinidaththil Vandhapodhu, Dhaaveedhu Apnerukkum, Avanode Vandha Manusharukkum Virundhuseydhaan.

21 pinbu Apner Dhaaveedhai Nokki: Naan Ezhundhupoi Isravelai Ellaam Ummode Udanpadikkaipannumpadikku, Raajaavaagiya En Aandavanidaththil Serththukkondu Varugiren; Adhinaale Ummudaiya Aaththumaa Arasaala Virumbugira Idamellaam Arasaaluveer Endraan; Appadiye Dhaaveedhu Apnerai Anuppivittaan; Avan Samaadhaanaththode Ponaan.

22 dhaaveedhin Sevagarum Yovaabum Anegam Porutkalaik Kollaiyittu Thandilirundhu Konduvandhaargal; Appozhudhu Apner Ebronil Dhaaveedhinidaththil Illai; Avanai Anuppivittaan; Avan Samaadhaanaththode Poivittaan.
23 yovaabum Avanodirundha Ellaa Senaiyum Vandhapodhu, Nerin Kumaaranaagiya Apner Raajaavinidaththil Vandhaan Endrum, Avar Avanai Samaadhaanamaaippoga Anuppivittaar Endrum, Yovaabukku Ariviththaargal.
24 appozhudhu Yovaab Raajaavandaiyil Pravesiththu: Enna Seydheer? Idho Apner Ummidaththil Vandhaane, Neer Avanaip Pogavittadhu Enna?
25 nerin Kumaaranaagiya Apnerai Ariveere; Avan Ummai Mosampokkavum, Ummudaiya Pokkuvaraththai Ariyavum, Neer Seygiradhaiyellaam Aaraayavum Vandhaan Endru Sonnaan.

26 yovaab Dhaaveedhai Vittup Purappattavudane Avan Apnerai Dhaaveedhukkuth Theriyaamal Koottikkondu Varumpadi Aatkalai Anuppinaan; Avargal Seeraa Ennum Thuravumattumpoi Avanai Azhaiththukkonduvandhaargal.

27 apner Ebronukkuth Thirumbi Varugirapodhu, Yovaab Avanode Ragasiyamaaip Pesappogiravanpola, Avanai Olimugavaasalin Naduve Oru Pakkamaai Azhaiththuppoi, Than Thambi Aasageludaiya Raththappazhiyai Vaanga Ange Avanai Vayitrile Kuththikkondrupottaan.
28 dhaaveedhu Adhaik Kettapodhu: Nerin Kumaaranaagiya Apnerin Raththaththirkaaga, Enmelum En Raajyaththin Melum Karththarukku Munbaaga Endraikkum Pazhiyillai.

29 adhu Yovaabudaiya Thalaiyin Melum, Avan Thagappan Kudumbaththin Melum Sumandhiruppadhaaga; Yovaabin Veettaarile Pramiyakkaaranum, Kushtarogiyum, Kol Oondri Nadakkiravanum, Pattayaththaal Vizhugiravanum, Appam Kuraichchalullavanum Orukkaalum Ozhindhupovadhillai Endraan.
30 apner Kibiyonil Nadandha Yuththathile Thangal Thambiyaagiya Aasagelaik Kondradhinimiththam Yovaabum Avan Sagodharanaagiya Abisaayum Avanai Sangaarampanninaargal.

31 dhaaveedhu Yovaabaiyum, Avanodirundha Sagala Janangalaiyum Paarththu: Neengal Ungal Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondu, Rattuduththi, Apnerukku Munnaaga Nadandhu Dhukkankondaadungal Endru Solli, Dhaaveedhuraajaa Thaanumdpdadaikkup Pinsendraan.
32 avargal Apnerai Ebronile Adakkampannugaiyil, Raajaa Apnerin Kallaraiyandaiyile Saththamittu Azhudhaan; Sagala Janangalum Azhudhaargal.
33 raajaa Apnerukkaagap Pulambi: Madhikettavan Saagiradhupola Apner Seththupponaano?
34 un Kaigal Kattappadavum Illai, Un Kaalgalil Vilangu Podappadavum Illai; Dhushtar Kaiyil Madigiradhupola Madindhaaye Endraan; Appozhudhu Janangalellaarum Pinnum Adhigamaai Avanukkaaga Azhudhaargal.

35 pozhudhu Innum Irukkaiyil, Janangal Ellaarum Vandhu Appam Pusiyum Endru Dhaaveedhukku Sonnapodhu, Dhaaveedhu: Sooriyan Asthamikkiradharku Munne Naan Appaththaiyaagilum, Veredhaiyaagilum Rusipaarththaal Dhevan Enakku Adharku Sariyaagavum Adharku Adhigamaagavum Seyyakkadavar Endru Aanaiyittu Sonnaan.
36 janangal Ellaarum Adhai Gavaniththaargal, Adhu Avargal Paarvaikku Nandraayirundhadhu; Appadiye Raajaa Seydhadhellaam Sagala Janangalukkum Nalamaaith Thondrinadhu.
37 nerin Kumaaranaagiya Apneraik Kondrupottadhu Raajaavinaal Undaanadhallavendru Annaalile Sagala Janangalum, Isravelar Anaivarum Arindhukondaargal.
38 raajaa Than Oozhiyakkaararai Nokki: Indraiyadhinam Isravelil Prabuvum, Periya Manushanumaagiya Oruvan Vizhundhaan Endru Ariyeergalaa?

39 naan Raajaavaaga Abishegampannappattavanaayirundhapodhilum Naan Innum Balaveenan; Seruyaavin Kumaararaagiya Indha Manushar En Balaththukku Minjinavargalaayirukkiraargal; Andhap Pollaappai Seydhavanukkuk Karththar Avan Pollaappukkuththakkadhaai Sarikkattuvaaraaga Endraan.
